original_title: Watching the Sunset from the Bottom of the Ocean
overview: Since Gen-z was born, we have been bombarded with rhetoric that the world is ending. From climate change and nuclear war, to social injustice and the rise of fascism we have access to it all in the palm of our hand. How do you find meaning at the end?

production_companies.name: Florida State University College of Motion Picture Arts

title: Watching the Sunset from the Bottom of the Ocean
